sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from './sidebar'; class Muhurtha extends Component { render() { let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/' let imagealt = 'image' return (

  • 28 March 2025

Stars In Astrology

üï∞Ô∏è Muhurtham (‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡Æπ‡ØÇ‡Æ∞‡Øç‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡Øç)

The powerful concept of choosing the right time to start something auspicious. This is a key part of Vedic astrology (‡Æú‡Øã‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æü‡ÆÆ‡Øç) and widely followed in Tamil culture.

üìñ What is Muhurtham (‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡Æπ‡ØÇ‡Æ∞‡Øç‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡Øç)?

  • Marriage (‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Æ£‡ÆÆ‡Øç)
  • Housewarming (‡Æï‡Æø‡Æ∞‡Æπ‡Æ™‡Øç‡Æ™‡Æø‡Æ∞‡Æµ‡Øá‡Æö‡ÆÆ‡Øç)
  • Naming ceremony (‡Æ®‡Ææ‡ÆÆ‡Æï‡Æ∞‡Æ£‡ÆÆ‡Øç)
  • Starting a business or signing contracts
  • Traveling, buying property, etc.

Choosing the right Muhurtham increases success, peace, and divine support, while avoiding bad timing protects from obstacles.

üìÜ What Factors Decide a Good Muhurtham?

‚úÖ Tithi (‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ§‡Æø): Some Tithis are considered auspicious like Dwitiya, Tritiya, Panchami, while Amavasya, Chaturdashi are avoided.

‚úÖ Nakshatra (‡Æ®‡Æü‡Øç‡Æö‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ∞‡ÆÆ‡Øç): Good stars include Rohini, Mrigashira, Pushya, Hasta, Anuradha, Revati. Avoid Moola, Aslesha, Bharani for weddings.

‚úÖ Yoga (‡ÆØ‡Øã‡Æï‡ÆÆ‡Øç): Favorable: Siddha, Amrita, Shubha. Avoid: Vyatipata, Vishkumbha.

‚úÖ Karana (‡Æï‡Æ∞‡Æ£‡ÆÆ‡Øç): Good Karanas: Bava, Balava, Kaulava.

‚úÖ Weekday (‡Æµ‡Ææ‡Æ∞‡Æô‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≥‡Øç): Thursday (education), Friday (marriage), avoid Sunday/Tuesday for weddings.

‚úÖ Lagna (‡Æ≤‡Æï‡Øç‡Æ©‡ÆÆ‡Øç): The Lagna should be strong and free from malefic influence.

üõë Doshas to Avoid During Muhurtham

Dosha Effect
Rahu Kalam (‡Æ∞‡Ææ‡Æï‡ØÅ ‡Æï‡Ææ‡Æ≤‡ÆÆ‡Øç) Avoid for any auspicious task ‚Äì brings negative influence
Yama Gandam (‡ÆØ‡ÆÆ ‡Æï‡Æ£‡Øç‡Æü‡ÆÆ‡Øç) Associated with death and obstacles
Gulika Kalam (‡Æï‡ØÅ‡Æ≥‡Æø‡Æï‡Øà) Neutral or negative depending on the activity
Durmuhurtham Inauspicious segments of time during a day

üå∏ Types of Muhurtham in Tamil Tradition

Purpose Tamil Name
Marriage ‡Æï‡Æ≤‡Øç‡ÆØ‡Ææ‡Æ£ ‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡Æπ‡ØÇ‡Æ∞‡Øç‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡Øç
Housewarming ‡Æï‡Æø‡Æ∞‡Æπ‡Æ™‡Øç‡Æ™‡Æø‡Æ∞‡Æµ‡Øá‡Æö‡ÆÆ‡Øç
Business Launch ‡Æµ‡Æø‡ÆØ‡Ææ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æ∞ ‡ÆÜ‡Æ∞‡ÆÆ‡Øç‡Æ™‡ÆÆ‡Øç
Child Naming ‡Æ®‡Ææ‡ÆÆ‡Æï‡Æ∞‡Æ£‡ÆÆ‡Øç
Thread Ceremony ‡Æ™‡ØÇ‡Æ£‡ØÇ‡Æ≤‡Øç ‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§‡Ææ‡Æ©‡Øà
Journey Start ‡Æ™‡ÆØ‡Æ£ ‡ÆÜ‡Æ∞‡ÆÆ‡Øç‡Æ™‡ÆÆ‡Øç

üîÆ Marriage Muhurtham Checklist

  • ‚úÖ Auspicious Nakshatra
  • ‚úÖ No Doshas (Rahu Kalam, etc.)
  • ‚úÖ Saptapadi Muhurtham (moment for tying the knot)
  • ‚úÖ Strong Lagna (Ascendant)
  • ‚úÖ Good placement of Jupiter and Venus
  • ‚úÖ Horoscope compatibility check
‚ÄúTime is energy. A right time unlocks divine flow. That‚Äôs the wisdom of Muhurtam.‚Äù
) } } export default Muhurtha;
